    "comment": [
        "The sequence can also be generated by adding of the top-row elements of the (n-1)st power of the matrix [[0,1],[1,1/5]] and multiplying with 5^(n-1)."
    ],

        "Nathaniel Johnston, <a href=\"/A122995/b122995.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..500</a>",

    ],
    "formula": [
        "a(n) = a(n-1)+25*a(n-2). [_Philippe Del\u00e9ham_, Mar 26 2009]",
        "a(n) = A122999(n-1) + 4*A122999(n-2). [_R. J. Mathar_, Aug 12 2009]",
        "a(n) = (1/2+9*sqrt(101)/202)*(1/2+sqrt(101)/2)^(n-1) + (1/2-9*sqrt(101)/202)*(1/2-sqrt(101)/2)^(n-1). [_Antonio Alberto Olivares_, Jun 07 2011]"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "M := {{0, 1}, {1, 1/5}}; v[1] = {1, 1}; v[n_] := v[n] = M.v[n - 1]; a = Table[v[n][[1]]*5^(n - 1), {n, 1, 30}]",
        "LinearRecurrence[{1,25},{1,5},30] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 11 2017 *)"
